title: Why do we attribute the discovery of America to Cristoforo Colombo instead of Amerigo Vespucci? - Quora

response.answer_text: Without Christopher Columbus oh, they're probably would not have been an Amerigo Vespucci. We say this because it's entirely possible though not probable that Vespucci would have sailed without Columbus's news of land being so close. Indeed Columbus got to this region before Vespucci and that is why he deserves the credit.
